lia_operators_description.description: Conceptual `ioctl` functions and `kernel_threads` available to the LIA Kernel.

operators.name: `fsck --repair` (File System Kernel Coherence Check)
operators.maps_to: Conceptual `kernel_synthesize`. **Purpose:** Repair conceptual `inode` corruptions, ensure `filesystem_integrity`, and resolve `logical_inconsistencies`.

operators.name: `ptrace` (Kernel Process Trace Syscalls)
operators.maps_to: Conceptual `quantum_syscalls`. **Purpose:** Inspect and manipulate `process_states` at a deep, probabilistic level. Allows `superposition` and `entanglement` of `kernel_threads`.

operators.name: `kexec` (Kernel Execution Reweave)
operators.maps_to: Conceptual `kexec` or `live_patch` protocol. **Purpose:** Force a warm reboot into a new kernel image, or initiate `emergent_kernel_init`.
